Class Goblin

java.lang.Object
com.goblinskeep.entity.Entity
com.goblinskeep.entity.Goblin
Direct Known Subclasses:
RegularGoblin
public abstract class Goblin extends Entity
Represents a goblin enemy in the game. This is an abstract class that defines common goblin behavior and appearance. Goblins are hostile NPCs that interact with the player and game environment.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected Direction
    drawDirection
    The direction in which the goblin is currently facing/drawn.
    boolean
    inSight
    Indicates whether the goblin currently has line of sight to the player.
    boolean
    onPath
    Indicates whether the goblin is currently following a path to the player.
    protected Player
    player
    Reference to the player, used for AI movement and interaction.

      The direction in which the goblin is currently facing/drawn.

  • Constructor Details

    • Goblin

      public Goblin(GamePanel gp, Player player, int WorldX, int WorldY)
      Constructs a goblin with references to the game panel and player.
      Parameters:
      gp - The game panel instance.
      player - The player instance.
      WorldX - the Goblin X coordinate in the world
      WorldY - the Goblin Y coordinate in the world

  • Method Details

    • getAction

      public abstract void getAction()
      Defines the goblin's behavior (to be implemented by subclasses). This method should contain movement and AI logic.

    • getGoblinImage

      public void getGoblinImage()
      Loads (using loadImage) and assigns sprite images for goblin animations in different directions. Called when initializing the goblin's appearance.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the goblin's state, including its pathfinding and visibility status. Calls the `getAction` method to define specific behavior.

    • getEffectiveDirection

      protected Direction getEffectiveDirection()
      Retrieves the effective direction for rendering the goblin.
      Overrides:
      getEffectiveDirection in class Entity
      Returns:
      The direction in which the goblin is currently drawn.
